press.title: Xovxwm
press.contact: Yog xav nug txog xovxwm, sau email rau press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: Yog xav nug txog xovxwm, sau email rau press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia yog ib lub messenger muaj kev ruaj ntseg nrog kev txhais lus tam sim thiab E2E encryption, tsim los pab kom kev sib txuas lus thoob ntiaj teb yooj yim thiab ntiag tug.
press.assetsText: Logos, screenshots, thiab duab khoom (yuav los tom ntej).

careers.title: Kauj ruam haujlwm
careers.intro: Peb yog pab pawg me tab sis tsim ib lub messenger ntiag tug thoob ntiaj teb. Yog koj saib xyuas txog encryption, kev nkag tau siv, thiab UX zoo saib, peb xav hnov xov ntawm koj.
careers.openRoles: Qhib haujlwm: Engineering (Full‑stack, iOS, Android), Product, Support.
careers.apply: Yuav thov li cas: Email koj daim resume/links rau jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Hais txog Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia yog ib lub messenger ntau hom lus nrog end‑to‑end encryption, txhais lus tam sim, thiab hu/yeem yees duab. Peb lub hom phiaj: pab tib neeg txuas lus — muaj kev nyab xeeb, ntiag tug, thiab hla lus tau yooj yim.

values.privacy: Ntiag tug ua ntej: E2E encryption raws li qub.
values.access: Nkag tau rau txhua leej: Txhais tsis siv tes tshaj 100 hom lus.
values.control: Kev tswj: Lus ploj tom qab sijhawm & read receipts yog xaiv tau.

about.howDescription: Cov lus raug encrypt hauv koj lub cuab yeej ua ntej xa mus. Kev txhais lus, thaub qab, thiab sync yog tsim kom peb cov server pom tau yam tsawg kawg nkaus.

advertise.title: Tshaj tawm nrog Chatforia
advertise.description: Mus cuag cov neeg siv chat nrog qhov chaw pom zoo, nyab xeeb rau hom. Peb muaj banners nyob rau chaw pom, kev sponsor, thiab house promos. Cov neeg Premium tsis pom tshaj tawm.

adsense.withPubId: Tam sim no peb siv Google AdSense. Yog koj xav cuam tshuam los ntawm Google Ads, siv publisher ID {{pubId}} thiab thov kom muaj managed placement rau peb cov units hauv qab no. Peb txais kev sponsor ncaj qha — siv daim foos.
adsense.noPubId: Tam sim no peb siv Google AdSense. Kev sponsor ncaj qha kuj muaj — siv daim foos hauv qab no.

advertise.noPlacements: Tsis tau teeb cov chaw tshaj tawm. Ntxiv lawv rau ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Sijhawm nkag rov ntau thiab nyob ntev hauv chat UI
why.brandSafe: Hom‑nyab xeeb; tswj zaus qhia kom tsis ntxhov
why.sponsoredMoments: Sponsored moments (piv: "Start a Chat" modal) muaj
why.deals: Kev xauj ncaj qha lossis programmatic los ntawm AdSense/Google Ads

gettingStarted.title: Pib Siv
gettingStarted.subtitle: Tshiab rau Chatforia? Daim qhia luv no yuav pab kom koj pib siv tau tam sim.

alert.text: Daim qhia no yuav loj hlob ntxiv raws peb tso tawm nta tshiab. Yog muaj dab tsi ploj lawm, qhia peb los ntawm

section1.title: 1) Tsim koj account
section1.loginText: nrog koj tus account twb muaj lawm.

section2.title: 2) Pib sib tham
section2.item1: Tsim DM lossis Pab Pawg thiab xa koj lo lus thawj zaug.
section2.item2: Siv kev txhais lus tam sim kom sib tham hla 100+ hom lus.
section2.item3: Sim lus ploj tom qab sijhawm thiab read receipts hauv Profile → Privacy.

section3.title: 3) Mus ntxiv
section3.item1Part1: Tswj koj lub phiajxwm hauv nplooj
section3.item1Part2: (Plus = tsis muaj tshaj tawm, Premium = nta tag nrho).
section3.item2Part1: Txuas ntxiv lwm lub cuab yeej thiab teeb thaub qab muaj lo lus zais hauv

account.q: Kuv tsim lossis rov qab kuv account li cas?
account.a: Rub lub app lossis siv web, ntaus ‘Tsim account’, txheeb xyuas koj email/xov tooj. Rov qab, siv ‘Nco tsis lo lus zais’.

privacy.q: Puav leej lus puas muaj end‑to‑end encryption?
privacy.a: Yog lawm. Cov lus thiab hu muaj end‑to‑end encryption raws li qub. Tsuas yog koj thiab tus txais thiaj nyeem tau.

translate.q: Kev txhais tam sim ua haujlwm li cas?
translate.a: Qhib ‘Txhais tsis siv tes’ hauv Chaw Teeb Tsa → Qhov Pom & Lus. Peb txhais hauv‑cuab‑nywj tau, yog tsis tau ces siv APIs ruaj ntseg nrog metadata tsawg kawg.

contact.a: Sau email rau support@chatforia.com. Ntxiv screenshot thiab koj qhov app version.

contact.title: Tiv Tauj Peb
contact.successMsg: Ua tsaug — peb pab neeg yuav teb los ntawm email.
contact.errorSend: Tsis xa tau. Thov email rau support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Txoj Cai Ntiag Tug no piav qhia tias Chatforia (‘peb’) sau, siv, thiab sib qhia ntaub ntawv li cas thaum koj siv peb cov app thiab kev pab cuam. Peb tsim Chatforia kom peb pom tau koj cov ntaub ntawv tsawg kawg nkaus.

infoWeCollect.title: Ntaub ntawv peb sau
infoWeCollect.account: Ntaub ntawv account (piv: email/xov tooj) los tsim thiab ruaj ntseg koj account.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Ntaub ntawv encrypted (lus/hu) yog end‑to‑end encrypted; peb nyeem tsis tau.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Diagnostic/kev siv xws li crash logs, hom cuab yeej, lossis kev txheeb xyuas dav dav los txhim kho kev ua haujlwm.

howWeUse.title: Peb siv ntaub ntawv li cas
howWeUse.provide: Muab thiab ruaj ntseg kev pab (auth, nrhiav spam/kev ua phem).
howWeUse.improve: Txhim kho nta (qib txhais lus, muaj ruaj khov).
howWeUse.legal: Ua raws tej cai lij choj.

sharing.title: Kev sib qhia
sharing.body: Peb tsis muag cov ntaub ntawv tus kheej. Peb tej zaum yuav sib qhia me ntsis nrog cov chaw pab ua haujlwm (piv: push, analytics) raws li daim ntawv cog lus nruj.

rights.title: Koj txoj cai
rights.body: Nyob ntawm koj cheeb tsam (piv: GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), koj muaj cai thov saib, kho, tshem, lossis tawm ntawm qee hom kev siv. Tiv tauj: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Kev khaws cia & kev ruaj ntseg
retention.body: Peb tsuas khaws yam tsim nyog rau kev ua haujlwm xwb thiab siv kev ruaj ntseg raws kev lag luam. E2E cov ntsiab lus peb tsis qhib tau.

children.title: Menyuam yaus
children.body: Chatforia tsis tsim rau cov me nyuam hnub nyoog qis dua 13 (lossis raws koj cheeb tsam cov cai).

changes.title: Kev hloov
changes.body: Peb yuav tshaj tawm kev hloov ntawm no thiab kho ‘Hloov kho zaum kawg’ hnub tim.

contact.title: Tiv tauj
contact.body: privacy@chatforia.com • [Lub npe tuam txhab raug cai], [Chaw nyob]

intro.body: Thaum koj siv Chatforia ces koj pom zoo rau cov Cai no. Yog tsis pom zoo ces tsis txhob siv kev pab.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Muab ntaub ntawv tseeb thiab khaws koj cov password kom ruaj ntseg.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Koj yog tus lub luag haujlwm rau yam ua hauv koj account.

acceptableUse.title: Kev siv tsim nyog
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Tsis txhob tso cai txhaum cai, ua phem, lossis ua txhaum cai; tsis txhob spam lossis siv tshuab ua phem.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Peb yuav ncua/txiav kev siv yog muaj kev ua txhaum.

yourContent.title: Koj cov ntsiab lus
yourContent.body: Koj tseem khaws cai ntawm koj cov ntsiab lus. Koj pub rau peb cov cai tsim nyog los khiav kev pab (piv: routing, khaws, txhais lus).

disclaimer.title: Kev tsis lees lav & kev lav ris
disclaimer.body: Kev pab muab ‘raws li qub’ yam tsis muaj kev lees lav. Raws li cai pub, Chatforia tsis lav ris rau tej yam kev puas tsuaj tsis ncaj qha lossis los ntawm tshwm sim.

changes.title: Kev hloov
changes.body: Peb yuav kho cov cai no; kev siv mus ntxiv txhais tias koj lees txais.

contact.title: Tiv tauj
contact.body: support@chatforia.com • [Lub npe tuam txhab raug cai], [Chaw nyob]

doNotSell.title: Tsis Muag lossis Sib Qhia Kuv Cov Ntaub Ntawv Tus Kheej
doNotSell.body: Chatforia tsis muag ntaub ntawv tus kheej. Cov neeg nyob California tseem tuaj yeem xa qhov kev thov raws CPRA nrog lub khawm hauv qab no.

cookies.title: Chaw Teeb Cookie
cookies.body: Chatforia tsuas siv cookies tsawg kawg nkaus (piv: session, kev ruaj ntseg). Peb tsis siv cookies tshaj tawm ntawm lwm tus. Koj tswj cookies hauv koj lub browser.

phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Tsis tau muaj lej xov tooj. Xaiv raws thaj tsam (area code) kom pib texting.

accessibilitySettings.title: Kev Nkag Tau & Ceeb Toom Pom
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Kev xaiv pab kom siv Chatforia tau yooj yim yam tsis tas vam khom suab.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: Pib ntawm loj li qub. Nce yog koj nyiam loj dua hauv chaw nkag tau.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Ceeb toom pom rau lus & hu
Qhia banners thiab lub npe nplooj ci/ntsuab kom tsis nco.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Khiav vibration thaum lus tshiab (yog txhawb)
Ua kom lub cuab yeej co nrog ceeb toom.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Ci npo thaum hu tuaj
Ci nplooj tsaus kaum thaum muaj hu tuaj.
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Txhais ntawv tsis siv tes rau lus kaw suab
Ntxig daim ntawv sau rau cov suab xov uas koj tau.
accessibilitySettings.visualAlerts: Ceeb toom pom rau lus & hu
accessibilitySettings.visualAlertsDesc: Qhia banners thiab lub npe nplooj ci kom tsis nco xov.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewDesc: Ua kom lub cuab yeej co nrog ceeb toom.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallDesc: Muab ib pliag ci thaum hu tuaj.
